name: Bird Spotting
description:
Made for the Blind Jam, blind-friendly game jam.

Try and find the 5 birds based on their bird song. 

There's a bluejay, a crow, a sparrow, a cardinal and a robin hiding in the trees.

The game will start without vision, to start again with vision enabled press R. Then you can press space bar to disable vision.

ADWS to move, mouse to turn. 

Speech instructions in game.

Needs sound. Headphones highly recommended.

Credits:

Wall Texture: https://freestocktextures.com/texture/red-brick-wall-background,890.html

DinoPunch  - living birds (from Unity asset store)

Text to speech: 

https://ttsmp3.com/

https://www.text2speech.org/
